E-Mail Messages
Date: Saturday, 6/15/1973
Subject: Successful Promotion Day
Hello,
That was quite a nice game, the fans loved it!
It seems that the promotion was a success, our
fan interest increased!

Sincerly,
Your PR Director



Date: Monday, 6/17/1973
Subject: Status of Craig Kusick
Dear Sir,
Craig Kusick shouldn't play at AA Pittsfield Rangers!
He has an AVG of .192 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director
